docs.lead_paragraph: Hunger relief workers are getting creative at keeping small bellies full when U.S. schools - along with their free or reduced-price meals - close for summer.

headline.main: Hunger Groups Get Creative While U.S. Schools Out for Summer
headline.print_headline: Hunger Groups Get Creative While U.S. Schools Out for Summer

docs.snippet: Hunger relief workers are getting creative at keeping small bellies full when U.S. schools - along with their free or reduced-price meals - close for summer.

docs.lead_paragraph: The School Nutrition Association has done an about-face as it lobbies Congress to allow schools to opt out of the very nutrition rules it helped to create in 2012.

headline.main: Nutrition Group Lobbies Against Healthier School Meals It Sought, Citing Cost
headline.print_headline: Nutrition Group Lobbies Against Healthier School Meals It Sought, Citing Cost

docs.abstract: School Nutrition Assn reverses course over requirement to provide more fruits and vegetables and less sugar and salt in government-subsidized school meals, lobbying Congress to allow schools to opt out of the very nutrition rules it helped to create in 2012.
docs.snippet: The School Nutrition Association has done an about-face as it lobbies Congress to allow schools to opt out of the very nutrition rules it helped to create in 2012.

docs.lead_paragraph: Maine began printing photos on welfare cards Tuesday despite warnings from the U.S. Department of Agriculture that the move, which the state's Republican governor said is necessary to combat fraud, could cost it federal funding.

headline.main: Maine Photo Welfare ID Program Draws Fire From U.S.
headline.print_headline: Maine Photo Welfare ID Program Draws Fire From U.S.

docs.snippet: Maine began printing photos on welfare cards Tuesday despite warnings from the U.S. Department of Agriculture that the move, which the state's Republican governor said is necessary to combat fraud, could cost it federal funding.

docs.lead_paragraph: African refugees who have fled wars or persecution face cuts in their daily rations because of a $225 million shortfall for vital food programs, the United Nations said on Tuesday.

headline.main: African Refugees Face Cuts in Rations as Funding Runs Low: U.N.
headline.print_headline: African Refugees Face Cuts in Rations as Funding Runs Low: U.N.

docs.snippet: African refugees who have fled wars or persecution face cuts in their daily rations because of a $225 million shortfall for vital food programs, the United Nations said on Tuesday.

docs.lead_paragraph: This version of succotash is lima-bean-free, with a kick that is a lively contrast to the sweet corn.

headline.main: Big Bowl With Spicy Brown Bean, Squash and Corn Succotash

docs.snippet: This version of succotash is lima-bean-free, with a kick that is a lively contrast to the sweet corn.

docs.lead_paragraph: Powdered eggshells can be a useful source of dietary calcium, comparable to a supplement, but crunching on coarse bits will probably not have much nutritional effect.

headline.seo: Eating the Shell Along With the Egg?

docs.abstract: Science Q&A on whether eating eggshells is good or bad for health.
docs.snippet: Powdered eggshells can be a useful source of dietary calcium, comparable to a supplement, but crunching on coarse bits will probably not have much nutritional effect.
